Weather App

An Android app that locates the nearest city and fetches and displays the appropriate weather data.

Created using: Android Studio, Java, XML and JSON


This weather app gets the current weather conditions and temperature based on a user's GPS location. Users can also check the current weather by searching for a city. Weather updates are provided by the Open Weather API : http://openweathermap.org/api
